verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I lay all that I am at Your feet.
I give You all of my life; I give You all of me.
Because of who You are,
Because of who You said I'll be,
Because of all You've done,
For the work You've done in me.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I give my life for what it's worth; I give my soul.
I'm giving up every part
that I may hold.
I offer up to You this humble sacrifice.
I'm letting go; I'm letting go.
I offer up to You this humble sacrifice.
I'm letting go; I'm letting go.
